en.title: The First Week After Bringing Your Kitten Home: Steps for a Smooth Adjustment
en.content:
The first week after bringing your kitten home is a crucial period for them to adjust to their new environment. Be patient and follow your kitten's pace.

Days 1-2

Let the kitten settle quietly in one room. Check that they are eating, drinking water, and using the litter box. Only interact when the kitten approaches you on their own.

Days 3-4

The kitten will gradually become more comfortable. Start short play sessions and try calling their name. Slowly allow them to explore other rooms.

Days 5-7

Once appetite and litter box habits have stabilized, gradually expand their roaming area. Increase interaction with all family members. Begin practicing brushing and nail trimming in short sessions.

Daily Checklist

Observe daily whether appetite is stable, elimination is normal, the kitten is playing energetically, and whether there are any symptoms such as sneezing or eye discharge. If anything seems abnormal, consult your veterinarian.

zh.title: 幼猫到家后第一周的照料方法：循序渐进的适应步骤
zh.content:
到家后的第一周是幼猫适应新环境的重要时期。不要着急，请按照幼猫自己的节奏来。

第1-2天

让幼猫在一个房间里安静地待着。确认食物、饮水和猫砂盆的情况，检查进食量和排泄情况。只在幼猫主动靠近时才进行互动。

第3-4天

幼猫会逐渐习惯环境。可以开始短时间的玩耍，尝试呼唤它的名字。慢慢允许它探索其他房间。

第5-7天

当食欲和排泄稳定后，逐步扩大活动范围。增加与所有家庭成员的互动。也可以开始少量练习梳毛和剪指甲。

每日检查要点

每天观察食欲是否稳定、排泄是否正常、是否活泼地玩耍、有无打喷嚏或眼部分泌物等症状。如发现异常，请及时咨询兽医。
